pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

pathParameters.name: accountName
pathParameters.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.
